subject: RE: [junit] code works with textui, but not with swingui/awtui
msgSnippet: By changing my AllTests class code - I made the suite() method static- , I could finally make it work for both the text an the graphic uis, BUT I still face an
messageBody:
By changing my AllTests class code - I made the suite() method static- ,
I could finally make it work for both the text an the graphic uis,

BUT

I still face an inconsistence in the parameter of the
junit.xx.TestRunner.run ( param)

(see complete code below)

-----------
Problem :
-----------
for awtui, only 1 way to call it (see complete class code below)
junit.awtui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.class) ;

for textui, 2 ways work fine
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( new AllTests("").suite() ) ;
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.suite() ) ;

but the one that mimic awtui does not work (no tests to run)
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.class ) ;



-----------
Code :
-----------
public class AllTests extends TestSuite {

public static void main( String[] args )
{
WebTestCase.initLog4j(args, "AllTests");

// OK for awtui ;
junit.awtui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.class) ;

// OK for textui
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( new AllTests("").suite() ) ;
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.suite() ) ;

// FAIL for textui
junit.textui.TestRunner.run ( AllTests.class ) ;
}

public AllTests ( String name ) {
super( name );

this.addTest( new AllTestsFast("fast") );
this.addTest( new AllTestsSlow("slow") );
}


public static Test suite () {
return new AllTests("") ;
}


// the old version, that did not work with awtui
// public Test suite () { return this ;}


}
